meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of comedy.
meanings.sent1: The comedic play had the audience laughing throughout the entire performance.
meanings.sent2: Her comedic timing always brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent3: The comedic movie made everyone in the theater chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His comedic talent shone brightly on the stage.
meanings.sent5: The comedic elements in the show made it a hit with the viewers.

meanings.definition: Having the qualities of humor or amusement.
meanings.sent1: The comedic skit was a hit at the talent show.
meanings.sent2: She had a comedic way of making even the most serious situations light-hearted.
meanings.sent3: His comedic remarks always lightened the mood in the room.
meanings.sent4: The comedic twist at the end of the story caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent5: The comedic actor's performance was met with roaring laughter from the audience.

meanings.definition: In a humorous or amusing manner.
meanings.sent1: She delivered her lines comedically, making the audience burst into laughter.
meanings.sent2: The comedian told jokes comedically, keeping the crowd entertained.
meanings.sent3: The situation was handled comedically, diffusing any tension in the room.
meanings.sent4: He danced comedically across the stage, earning cheers from the audience.
meanings.sent5: The characters in the movie acted comedically, creating a fun and light-hearted atmosphere.
